Name: loudoun_2008_lcsa_water_line
LayerDisplayName: LCSA Water Main lines, Loudoun County, VA 2007
Originator: Loudoun County Sanitation Authority (LCSA), Planning   Development Engineering Department
OriginatorSort: Loudoun County Sanitation Authority (LCSA), Planning   Development Engineering Department
Abstract: This line feature contains water mains   corresponding information that falls within the boundary of Loudoun County.

    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This line feature contains water mains & corresponding information that falls within the boundary of Loudoun County.</abstract>
      <purpose>To provide spatially correct location & information for water mains & structures within Loudoun County.</purpose>
      <supplinf>Data are stored in the corporate ArcSDE Geodatabase as a line feature class.  The coordinate system is Virginia State Plane (North), Zone 4501, datum NAD83 HARN (vertical datum, if applicable, NAVD88), US Survey foot units

LCSA (Loudoun County Sanitary Authority) provides two Datasets to Loudoun County Office of Mapping & Geographic Information (OMAGI): Waste water and Water to OMAGI.  These two datasets are combined and four new datasets created from the source data: Wastewater_Line, Wastewater_Point, Water_Line, & Water_Point.</supplinf>
    </descript>
